Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 474 Bicycles, Motorized Bicycles and Motorcycles

474.01 CODE APPLICATION TO BICYCLES AND MOTORIZED BICYCLES.

474.02 RIDING UPON SEATS; CARRYING PACKAGES; HANDLE BARS; HELMETS AND GLASSES.

474.03 ATTACHING BICYCLES, MOTORIZED BICYCLES OR MOTORCYCLES TO OTHER VEHICLES.

474.04 RIDING ON RIGHT SIDE OF ROADWAY; RIDING ABREAST.

474.05 LIGHTS, SIGNAL DEVICES AND BRAKES ON BICYCLES AND MOTORIZED BICYCLES.

474.06 RIDING BICYCLES UPON SIDEWALKS.

474.07 SAFE RIDING REGULATIONS FOR BICYCLES.

474.08 PARKING; LOCKS.

474.09 PARENT’S RESPONSIBILITY.

474.10 SUSPENSION OF RIDING PRIVILEGES; IMPOUNDING OF BICYCLES.

474.11 OPERATION OF MOTORIZED BICYCLES.

474.12 SAFE RIDING REGULATIONS FOR MOTORIZED BICYCLES.

474.13 IMPOUNDING OF MOTORIZED BICYCLES.

474.14 PATHS EXCLUSIVELY FOR BICYCLES.
